name: Ori
flavorText: A small feline predator that scratches everything with his claws, but can purr to calm friends.

abilities.name: Purring Calm
abilities.text: Once per turn, when this Pokémon is hit by an attack, you may prevent all effects of that attack, including damage.

attacks.name: Clawed Swipe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
